response.overview: After a defecting Russian general reveals a plot to assassinate foreign spies, James Bond is assigned a secret mission to dispatch the new head of the KGB to prevent an escalation of tensions between the Soviet Union and the West.
response.tagline: The new James Bond...living on the edge.
response.title: The Living Daylights

titles.title: James Bond - Spioner dør ved daggry
Τζέιμς Μποντ, Πράκτωρ 007: Με Το Δάχτυλο Στη Σκανδάλη
